title: Management of Organizational Change
content: Organizational changes—staffing, structure, outsourcing, role changes—can degrade MAH control if poorly managed. MOC procedures must assess safety impacts of organizational changes, including transitional risks. Key competencies must be transferred, workload managed, and procedures updated before changes are implemented. Organizational MOC is as critical as technical MOC.
openQuestions: Does your MOC procedure explicitly address organizational changes?
What organizational changes have occurred without adequate HF impact assessment?
